title: Chris Kyle and the American Sniper.
subtitle: "The American sniper" Chris Kyle didn't shoot dozens of Hurricane Katrina thieves, killed two attempted carjackings, and hit Jesse Ventura in the face.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The subject of the American sniper Chris Kyle shot dozens of thieves after Hurricane Katrina, killed two attempted carjackings, and hit Jesse Ventura in the face.
